statements: SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type FROM instruments WHERE instrument_type='Guitar';
SELECT instrument_type, instrument_value FROM instruments WHERE instrument_value > 1000;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_value FROM instruments ORDER BY instrument_value DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name FROM instruments WHERE instrument_name LIKE '%violin%' AND instrument_type='String';
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Guitar' ORDER BY instrument_value DESC, instrument_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_value FROM instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Piano' AND instrument_value > 1000 ORDER BY instrument_name ASC;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type, instrument_value FROM instruments WHERE instrument_value between 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_type, instrument_value FROM instruments WHERE instrument_type IN ('Guitar', 'Flute') ORDER BY instrument_type ASC, instrument_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE instrument_name LIKE '%elec%' ORDER BY instrument_name ASC, instrument_value DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, value FROM instruments WHERE instrument_id = 1;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, value FROM instruments WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_holder = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE instrument_name LIKE '%guitar%';
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, value FROM instruments WHERE instrument_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_holder LIKE 'John%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, instrument_name, value FROM insurance_policies JOIN instruments ON insurance_policies.instrument_id = instruments.instrument_id WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT instrument_name, value FROM instruments ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_value FROM instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Guitar';
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_type FROM instruments ORDER BY instrument_type DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_amount > 1000;

SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, policy_holder FROM instruments JOIN instrument_insurance ON instruments.instrument_id = instrument_insurance.instrument_id JOIN insurance_policies ON instrument_insurance.policy_id = insurance_policies.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM instruments ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_type FROM instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Guitar';
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY policy_amount ASC;

SELECT instruments.instrument_name, insurance_policies.policy_holder FROM instruments JOIN instrument_insurance ON instruments.instrument_id = instrument_insurance.instrument_id JOIN insurance_policies ON instrument_insurance.policy_id = insurance_policies.policy_id;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_value FROM instruments WHERE instrument_value BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY instrument_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT id, name FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT policy_number, client_name FROM policies JOIN clients ON policies.client_id = clients.client_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_instruments WHERE policy_id = 1 ORDER BY instrument_id DESC;
SELECT name, value FROM instruments WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM instruments ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT client_name, policy_number, value FROM clients JOIN policies ON clients.client_id = policies.client_id JOIN policy_instruments ON policies.policy_id = policy_instruments.policy_id JOIN instruments ON policy_instruments.instrument_id = instruments.id WHERE instruments.value > 1000;
SELECT client_name, COUNT(policy_id) AS num_policies FROM clients LEFT JOIN policies ON clients.client_id = policies.client_id GROUP BY client_name HAVING COUNT(policy_id) > 2;

SELECT instruments.name AS instrument_name, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM instruments JOIN policy_instruments ON instruments.id = policy_instruments.instrument_id GROUP BY instruments.name ORDER BY total_value DESC;

SELECT policy_number, instruments.name AS instrument_name FROM policies JOIN policy_instruments ON policies.policy_id = policy_instruments.policy_id JOIN instruments ON policy_instruments.instrument_id = instruments.id WHERE instruments.value < 5000;
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT name, value FROM instruments WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM instruments ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT name, category_name FROM instruments JOIN instrument_categories ON instruments.id = instrument_categories.instrument_id JOIN categories ON instrument_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT owner_name, value FROM owners JOIN instrument_owners ON owners.owner_id = instrument_owners.owner_id JOIN instruments ON instrument_owners.instrument_id = instruments.id WHERE value < 5000;
SELECT id, name, value FROM instruments;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, category_id FROM instrument_categories WHERE instrument_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT instrument_id, owner_id FROM instrument_owners WHERE owner_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-a1b2c3d4e5f' ORDER BY instrument_id ASC;

SELECT * FROM instruments JOIN instrument_categories ON instruments.id = instrument_categories.instrument_id JOIN categories ON instrument_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE instruments.value > 1000;
